subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Colt McCoy was hurt scoring a touchdown on the Longhorns’ opening drive, and his replacement struggled in a 45-42 loss to Kansas State that knocked No. 4 Texas out of the hunt for this year’s title.
snippet: Colt McCoy was hurt scoring a touchdown on the Longhorns’ opening drive, and his replacement struggled in a 45-42 loss to Kansas State that knocked No. 4 Texas out of the hunt for this year’s title.
